# from a source YaTool build configuration provided in ya.make files.
#
# If the repository supports both CMake and ya build configurations, please modify both of them.
#
# If only CMake build configuration is supported then modify only CMake files and note that only
# simple modifications are allowed like adding source-files to targets or adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories. These modifications will be ported to original ya.make files
# by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be easily ported back to the ya build
# system may be rejected.
#
# Please refer to the build instructions in the repository for more information about manual
# changes in this file.

find_package(linux-headers-generic REQUIRED)

add_library(yt-server-tablet_balancer)

target_compile_options(yt-server-tablet_balancer PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
)

target_link_libraries(yt-server-tablet_balancer PUBLIC
  linux-headers-generic::linux-headers-generic
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-yt-phdr_cache
  library-cpp-getopt
  yt-library-dynamic_config
  yt-yt-ytlib
  yt-yt-core
  server-lib-admin
  server-lib-cypress_election
  server-lib-cypress_registrar
  server-lib-misc
  server-lib-tablet_balancer
  server-lib-tablet_node
)

target_sources(yt-server-tablet_balancer PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/tablet_balancer/action_manager.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/tablet_balancer/bootstrap.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/tablet_balancer/bundle_state.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/tablet_balancer/config.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/tablet_balancer/dynamic_config_manager.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/tablet_balancer/helpers.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/tablet_balancer/program.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/tablet_balancer/reshard_iteration.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/tablet_balancer/table_registry.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/tablet_balancer/tablet_action.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/yt/yt/server/tablet_balancer/tablet_balancer.cpp
)
